content: r3 single_crochet 9 r4 single_crochet 9 finish off and stuff lightly leave a tail long enough for sewing tail use neon color r1 mc 6 6 r2 single_crochet 6 finish off leave a tail long enough for sewing assembly take your head and find where you changed colors this point will be the bottom making the finished bunny look seamless stitch on your ears to the back of the head towards the top on the matching color sides picture a next page next we will sew the arms onto the body with this one find your color change point on the body and make that the top sew the arms on matching colors one row away from the color seam picture b next page picture a picture b now sew the head and body together followed by the legs and tail finally we will add the finishing touches use some left over black yarn to make an x for the eye on the neon side take your red yarn and make a heart on the black side of the chest along with the white yarn to add some skeleton features and the eye for black side there you go you now have a skeleton bunny feel free to make this pattern and sell the finished product just please give credit for the pattern ⓣ
